projects.title: ImageStudioLab
projects.description: AI-powered image generation platform built with Next.js and Gemini 2.5 Flash. Create stunning AI-generated images for all platforms with professional quality, instant results, and privacy-first design.
projects.longDescription: ImageStudioLab is a cutting-edge AI-powered image generation platform that leverages Google's Gemini 2.5 Flash technology. It offers multiple generation modes including Style My Selfie, Add Me + Product, E-commerce Enhancement, and AI Editor. The platform features a privacy-first design with secure processing, daily credits system, and instant high-resolution downloads. Built for creators who demand quality and speed, it supports various professional styles and is optimized for Instagram, YouTube, LinkedIn, and all major social platforms.
achievements: Built comprehensive AI image generation platform
Created intuitive user experience with multiple generation modes
Achieved instant image generation under 5 seconds

projects.title: Link4Coders
projects.description: Developer-first bio platform built with Next.js. Create professional developer profiles with GitHub integration, interactive code snippets, project showcases, and skill matrices - all in one link.
projects.longDescription: Link4Coders is a comprehensive developer portfolio platform designed specifically for developers to showcase their work effectively. It features GitHub integration for repository management, interactive code snippets for skill demonstration, beautiful project cards with screenshots and tech stacks, skill matrices for proficiency visualization, and blog integration. The platform offers multiple professional templates including Minimalist Pro, Cyberpunk Terminal, and GitHub Focus themes. Built with a focus on developer experience, it provides seamless project showcasing and professional networking capabilities.

projects.title: IntegratePDF
projects.description: A comprehensive PDF management platform built with Next.js and TypeScript. Features include PDF processing, document workflows, and integration capabilities with various services.
projects.longDescription: IntegratePDF is a powerful PDF workflow automation tool that streamlines document processing. It includes features for PDF manipulation, automated workflows, Google Sheets integration, and webhook support for seamless document management.
achievements: Integrated Google Sheets for data management
Implemented robust error tracking with Sentry

projects.title: KlickTape
projects.description: A modern mobile application built with React Native and Expo. Features cross-platform compatibility, real-time functionality, and seamless user experience across iOS and Android.
projects.longDescription: KlickTape is a comprehensive mobile application that leverages the power of React Native and Expo for cross-platform development. It includes advanced features like real-time updates, push notifications, and native device integrations.
achievements: Achieved smooth performance on both platforms

projects.title: JJ Cosmetics Ad Campaign
projects.description: Comprehensive AI-generated advertising campaign for JJ Cosmetics featuring 8 unique promotional designs. Created stunning visual content for social media marketing and brand promotion.
projects.longDescription: A complete AI-powered advertising campaign for JJ Cosmetics featuring 8 professionally designed promotional images. The campaign includes various product showcases, lifestyle imagery, and brand-focused designs optimized for social media platforms. Each design incorporates modern aesthetics, compelling visual elements, and brand consistency to maximize engagement and conversion rates.
challenges: Creating consistent brand identity across multiple designs
Optimizing visuals for different social media platforms
achievements: Maintained brand consistency across all visuals

projects.title: Apromax
